author: Eun-Young Jeong
title: Meet the Coach Who Solidified North Korea’s Olympic Participation
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—In the months before the Olympics, South Korea’s government worked feverishly to bring their belligerent neighbors to the Games—as North Korea successfully test-fired long-range missiles and threatened to attack Guam.
One man was calm: a French-Canadian figure skating coach in Montreal.
Bruno Marcotte, coach of the bronze-medal... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
